reviews.text: We stayed in Yorozuya for only one night. Check in was fine, we arrived in the morning and left our luggage since we couldn't check in yet. Really friendly and helpful staffs. They assisted in making reservation for a temple tour in Kanazawa as well as assisted with some queries to another hotel in town. However, I read that the ticket for MATSUMOTO CASTLE is provided here at HALF THE PRICE. However, the receptionist didn't offer.
reviews.title: Lovely Peaceful Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was large for Japanese standard, with a single and an economy double for just the 2 of us. We had the view of the temple rooftops from our window. It was comfortable and quiet.
reviews.title: 平均以上のエコノミーホテル　　A budget hotel with more-than-avarage quality

reviews.text: Breakfast was another plus point. Not the biggest variety but good enough and in a nice dining room with pleasant view.
reviews.title: great location with castle views

reviews.text: I also like the neighborhood - Nice park next door with a couple of benches. I sat on that bench a few times waiting for the rest of my group to be ready... It was really pleasant and peaceful with the view of the river and residental apartments across and nice weather... I stayed in Dormy Inn a few days later which was slightly costlier but more central and modern. Yet, Yorozuya definitely has its charm...
reviews.title: Great deal, location, and breakfast

reviews.text: 年末にお世話になりました。
reviews.title: Happily surprised!
